property.name: hasBusinessMessage
property.default: By purchasing a practice level membership you are becoming a team admin.
property.label: Message when user has a Business Account but not a Team Admin

property.name: noBusinessMessage
property.default: By purchasing this product you are forming a team and becoming a team admin
property.label: Message when user doesn't have a Business Account

property.name: reqErrorMessage
property.label: Error Message when Team Name is null
